overview: Brasileira (Karol Lira) lives alone in a house in the interior of the cerrado (brazilian savannas). While preparing fruits for an offering, reality and fantasy are mixed in appearances of the mythological being Capikarã (Rodrigo D’Alcântara). Project produced during Cerrado Ecoarte International Artistic Residency (Brasília, DF, 2019)
title: Capikarã
